channel.title: Age Of Chaos 718/737
channel.description:
[center] [b][u]Server Owner[/u][/b] : Rhys
[u][b]Server Co-Owner[/b][/u] : Phenom
More Staff Needed!
Client Download : http://www.sendspace.com/file/2s499f
Server Forums : http://age-of-chaos.forumotion.co.uk
[u][b]Server Information[/b][/u]
Eco Server with a epic eco system 90% All Trainable skills Loyalti points and Auras Fully working Squeal of Fortune with daily spins Fully working pets with feeding to make pets grow Slayer with most tasks just like Rs King Black Dragon,Kalpite Queen and many more bosses! Money pouch for easy storing of cash Perfected Pking and item switching Switch item looks if you like the old runescape item looks Good staff team with awsome staffzone Donator zone and Donator Only Features Fast leveling with most correct and stable drops Hosted 24/7 with less to no lagg Minigames Such as barrows,Fight Pits,Fight Cave Many more coming soon! Crystal chest System With Awsome rares Such as Party Hats And Santa Hats Load stones And Fast teleporting On Quest Tab Awsome Shops With Eco Prices Pest Queen with korasi 100% korasi drop with correct spec! after been killed (Not 100% due to not having Correct Combat animations) [Added 10/12/2012] And Much More!! [/center]
